description: Describes Source additional and extensible attributes defined in the NMOS Parameter Registers.
title: Source resource

urn:x-matrox:receiver_id.description: UUID of the Receiver providing the essence to this Source or null

urn:x-matrox:layer.description: Layer of a multiplexed Receiver, if any, providing the essence to this Source

urn:x-matrox:synchronous_media.description: This attributes indicates that the media is synchronous (true) or asynchronous (false) to the source reference clock.
